document_data.title: Twilight Ambitions
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Twilight Ambitions''''', designed by [[Kevin Kimball]], is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 4th-edition ruleset. It focuses on the [[Yuirwood]], [[fey]], and the [[Cult of Voldini]].

{{Quote|''[[Aldaron|Aldaron the Loremaster]] has continued to delve into the mysteries of the ancient [[Tome of Twilight Boughs]]. But some of the book’s mysteries seem far from ancient and Aldaron needs the help of [[adventurer]]s to figure out why. This adventure concludes the Major Quest involving the Tome of Twilight Boughs (which began in AGLA1-1 [[Lost Temple of the Fey Gods]] and continued with AGLA1-4 [[Through Twilight Boughs]]). A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in [[Aglarond]] for characters levels 7-10.''|}}
